title: Conduct Fraud Brainstorming Session
description: As part of audit planning, the audit team holds a brainstorming session to identify potential fraud schemes in the area under review.

tasks.description: Schedule a meeting with the audit team assigned to the engagement.
During the meeting, lead a discussion on how fraud could occur in the accounts receivable process (e.g., lapping schemes, fictitious credits).
tasks.expected_outcome: The team identifies at least three plausible fraud schemes.

tasks.description: Document the potential fraud schemes and design specific audit tests to detect them.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit plan is updated with specific fraud-focused tests.
